text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium stolkiae is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium.
text.Further reading:
Dee, J. M.; Mollicone, M.; Longcore, J. E.; Roberson, R. W.; Berbee, M. L. (2015). "Cytology and molecular phylogenetics of Monoblepharidomycetes provide evidence for multiple independent origins of the hyphal habit in the Fungi". Mycologia. 107 (4): 710. doi:10.3852/14-275. PMID 25911696.
